import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import "./article.css"; import { Publish } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; export default function Article() { const location = useLocation(); const articleId = location.pathname.split("/")[2]; //const article = useSelector((state) => console.log(state.article.articles)); const article = useSelector((state) => state.article.articles.find((article) => article._id === articleId)); console.log(article) console.log(articleId) return (

Update article

{article.title}
id: {article._id}
in stock: {article.inStock}
); }
